text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Query Failures>
We are investigating increased query failures in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased Query Failures>
We can confirm customers are seeing an increase in stuck or failed queries in the US-EAST-1 Region. We have identified the root cause and continue to work toward resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased Query Failures>
We are starting to see recovery and customers will see some queries completing successfully. As we recover, customers may see transient errors. We continue to work towards a complete recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Query Failures>
We are seeing a significant reduction in error rates and most customers should see their queries completing successfully. We are continuing to work towards a complete recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Query Failures>
Between 11:36 AM and 1:50 PM PDT we experienced increased query failures in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
